title: Dealmaster: Apple gear, Lenovo laptops, and more
content:
As always, the web is loaded today with good deals on gadgets, video games, board games, and plenty of other stuff. In this edition of Dealmaster, you'll find curated deals on Apple gear, Lenovo laptops, and home accessoriesâ€”some of which will be great back-to-school buys, if that's a need for you. Let's dig into what we could find today!

Apple gear

Open it up, and it looks quite a bit like the 14-inch MacBook Pro from this angle. (credit: Samuel Axon)

  • MacBook Air 13.3-inch Laptop - Apple M1 chip for $750 (was $1,000) at Best Buy | Amazon
  • MacBook Pro 14-inch Laptop - M2 Pro chip for $1,799 (was $1,999) at Best Buy | Amazon
  • MacBook Pro 16-inch Laptop - M2 Pro chip for $2,250 (was $2,499) at Amazon
